alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 31 at 3:05AM EDT until April 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING TO 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Winds will become more westerly during the day on Saturday. * WHERE...Portions of southwest North Carolina and east Tennessee. * WHEN...From 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening to 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds may drop below advisory criteria for a few hours early Saturday morning as they shift to a more westerly direction and strengthen again during the day.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
